Translations.Text: Koraa, mora prati ahi nayila haiche ye, niscaya jinasakalara eta dale manoyoga sahakarae suniche; tara pichata kaiche, ‘niscaya ami eka bismayakara kora'ana sunicho
‘yito satyara patha dekhuraaya seye ami tara oparata imana anicho. Gatike ami ketiya'o amara pratipalakara lagata ana kako ansi buli ganya nakaraima
‘arau niscaya amara pratipalakara maryada su'ucca’ te'om kono sangini arau kono santano grahana karaa na'i
‘Arau amara majara nirbodhasakale allahara bisaye abastara katha-bataraa kaichila’
‘Athaca ami dharana karaichilo ye, manuha arau jina jatiye ketiya'o allaha samparke micha araopa nakaraiba
‘Arau niscaya kichumana manuhe kichumana jinara asraya laichila, phalata sihamte jinasakalara ahankara brd'dhi karaichila’
‘Arau niscaya sihamte'o dharana karaichila yenekai tomaloke dharana karaicha ye, allahe kako ketiya'o punaraut'thita nakaraiba’
‘Arau niscaya ami akasara tathya sangraha karaiba bicaraichilo, kintu ami dekhilo ye, akasakhana kathora praharai arau ulkapindara dbaraa paraipurna
‘arau ami agate akasara bibhinna ghamtita sambada sunara babe bahichilo kintu etiya konoba'i sambada sunibalai bicaraile si tara oparata niksepara babe prastuta jalanta ulkapindara sanmukhina haya
‘Arau niscaya ami najano ye, prthiraibasira babe amangala bicaraa haiche, ne sihamtara pratipalake sihamtara mangala bicaraiche
Arau niscaya amara majara kichumana haiche satkarmasila arau kichumana iyara byatikrama, ami achilo bibhinna pathara anusarai
‘arau ami buji pa'icho ye, ami prthiraita ketiya'o allahaka aparaga karaiba noraaraima arau palayana karai'o te'omka byartha karaiba noraaraima
‘Arau niscaya ami yetiya hidayatara bani sunilo, tetiya tara prati imana anilo. Eteke yi byakti tara pratipalakara prati imana aniba, tara kono ksati arau kono an'yayara asanka nathakiba
‘Arau niscaya amara majata ache kichu sankhyaka atmasamarpanakarai arau kichu sankhyaka ache simalanghanakarai; eteke yisakale ichalama grahana karaiche sihamte'i sathika patha bachi laiche
‘Arau yisakala simalanghanakarai, sihamte'i haiche jahannamara indhana’
Arau yadi sihamte sathika pathata abicala thakilehemtena, teneha’le ami niscaya sihamtaka pracura paraimane pani pana karaalohemtena
yate ami iyara dbaraa sihamtaka paraiksa karaiba parao; arau yiye nija pratipalakara smaranara paraa mukha ghuraa'i laya, taka te'om kathina sastita praraesa karaaba
Arau niscaya machajidasamuha allahara babe'i, gatike tomaloke allahara lagata ana kako namatiba
Arau niscaya yetiya allahara banda'i te'omka praarthana karaibalai thiya dile, tetiya sihamte te'omra ocarata ahi bhira karaile
Koraa, ‘ma'i kerala mora pratipalakake'i ahbana karao arau te'omra lagata ana kako ansi nakarao’
Koraa, ‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara kono ksati arau kalyanara malika nahaya’
Koraa, niscaya allahara paraa kone'o moka raksa karaiba noraaraiba arau te'omra bahirae ma'i ketiya'o kono asraya napama

‘Kerala allahara taraphara paraa te'omra raichalatara bani pracara karaatorae mora dayitba. Arau yiye allaha arau te'omra raachulaka aman'ya karaiba tara babe ache jahannamara ju'i, tata sihamte cirakala thakiba’

Arasesata yetiya sihamte iyaka pratyaksa karaiba, yi bisaye sihamtaka saradhana karaa haichila. Tetiya sihamte janibalai paba ye, sahayakarai hicape kona bechi durbala arau sankhyata kona ata'itakai kama
Koraa, ‘ma'i najano tomalokaka yitora pratisrauti diya haiche, se'ito nikatararti ne mora pratipalake iyara babe kono dirgha myada nirdharana karaiba’
Te'om adrsya bisayara jnani, arau te'om nijara adrsyara jnana karao ocarata prakasa nakarae
Kintu te'omra manonita raachulara bahirae. Tene ksetrata allahe te'omra raachulara sanmukhata arau pichata praharai niyukta karae

yate te'om prakasa karae ye, niscaya te'omloke te'omlokara pratipalakara raichalata paumca'i diche. Arau te'omlokara ocarata yi ache seya te'om jnanara dbaraa paraibestana karai raakhiche arau te'om pratito bastu ganana karai hicapa karai raakhiche
He bastraabrta
raati chalata adaya karaa, kichu ansara bahirae
adha raati ba tatokai alapa kama
athaba tatokai alapa bechi. Arau spastabharae dhirae dhirae kora'ana tilaraata karaa
Niscaya ami tomara prati eti gadhura bani aratirna karaima
Niscaya raati-jagarana atmasanyamara babe adhika prabala arau bakasphuranata adhika upayogi
Niscaya dinara bhagata tomara babe ache dirgha karmabyastata
Arau tumi tomara pratipalakara nama smarana karaa arau ekanisthabharae te'omra prati manonibesa karaa
Teraemi pura arau pascimara raba, te'omra bahirae ana kono (satya) ilaha na'i. Eteke te'omke'i tumi karya sampadanakarairaupe grahana karaa
Arau manuhe yi kaya tara oparata tumi dhairya dharana karaa arau saujan'yara saite sihamtaka paraihara karai cala
Arau bilasa samagraira adhikarai mithyaraopakaraisakalaka molai erai diya arau sihamtaka kichu samaya arakasa diya
Niscaya amara ocarata ache sikalisamuha arau prajbalita ju'i
arau ache ka'itayukta khadya arau yantranadayaka sasti
Yidina prthirai arau parbatasamuha prakampita ha’ba arau parbatasamuha biksipta calamana balimayata parainata ha’ba
Niscaya ami tomalokara babe saksi sbaraupe tomalokara ocarata raachula praerana karaicho yenekai phira'a'unara ocarata raachula praerana karaichilo
Kintu phira'a'une raachulaka aman'ya karaiche, seye ami taka sasti bihicho
Eteke tomaloke yadi kupharai karaa tente tomaloke se'i dinatota kenekai atma raksa karaiba yi dirase sisusakalaka brd'dhata parainata karaiba
Se'i dina akasakhana bidirna ha’ba, te'omra pratisrauti bastabayita ha’ba
Niscaya e'ito eta upadesa, eteke yiye iccha karae si nija pratipalakara patha aralambana karaka
